video.title: Royal Pains
video.synopsis: Dr. Hank Lawson unexpectedly gets a career upgrade as a freelance physician treating New York's aristocratic upper crust in their posh Hamptons homes.

episodes.synopsis: Young, brilliant and recently fired from an ER in Brooklyn, Dr. Hank Lawson now finds himself the newest "concierge doctor" in the Hamptons.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Hank, Evan, Jill and Divya attend a massive retirement party ... for a 27-year-old. The guest of honor passes out after eating a hot dog.
episodes.title: There Will Be Food

episodes.synopsis: Hank and Divya are called to the home of a U.S. senator whose pushy wife asks them to perform a discreet "executive physical" on their teenage son.
episodes.title: Strategic Planning

episodes.synopsis: When a restaurant owner suffers a stroke, Hank tries to save her from long-term damage, but she goes missing before treatment is administered.
episodes.title: TB or Not TB

episodes.synopsis: Just as Hank and Jill's relationship is beginning to blossom, he and Evan take a weekend-long assignment on a technology-free private island.
episodes.title: No Man Is an Island

episodes.synopsis: Hank quarantines guests at a "bark mitzvah" after some come down with a disease, which causes him and Jill to debate whether to call County Health.
episodes.title: If I Were a Sick Man

episodes.synopsis: A job offer from Boris brings Jill's childhood friend back to the Hamptons, but tempers flare when Hank learns Boris has been keeping a dark secret.
episodes.title: Crazy Love

episodes.synopsis: Hank unexpectedly takes on a successful children's book illustrator who has a serious heart condition, causing tension between him and Jill.
episodes.title: The Honeymoon's Over

episodes.synopsis: Hank and Divya attend a lavish equestrian show, where they treat a girl who's fallen off a horse and developed some bizarre symptoms.
episodes.title: It's Like Jamais Vu All Over Again

episodes.synopsis: When Hank learns Tucker's father has a substance abuse problem, he suggests a visit to rehab, but Tucker's father prefers a more risky method.
episodes.title: Am I Blue?

episodes.synopsis: While in New York to learn more about Boris's mysterious disease, Hank discovers the Gardner family is attempting to strip him of his medical license.
episodes.title: Nobody's Perfect

episodes.synopsis: Hank treats a woman suffering from hallucinations, Divya and Raj fret over their engagement party, and Charlie moves back in with Jill.
episodes.title: Wonderland

episodes.synopsis: Hank and Divya treat a famous inventor's son, whose desire to distance himself from his father puts him in harm's way.
episodes.title: Spasticity

episodes.synopsis: After having her heart broken, Newberg's stepdaughter lands in the hospital with a condition related to her relationship woes.
episodes.title: Lovesick

episodes.synopsis: When the star of a popular film franchise collapses, Hank discovers that the patient's illness is being caused by the very thing that made him famous.
episodes.title: Keeping the Faith

episodes.synopsis: Boris flies Hank to another country, where he and another doctor research potentially life-saving gene therapies.
episodes.title: Medusa

episodes.synopsis: Hank treats a Cuban dissident and works desperately to save Boris when his health quickly declines as a result of Marisa's treatment.
episodes.title: Mano a Mano

episodes.synopsis: Tucker suspects the worst when his best friend behaves recklessly. But Hank realizes that a medical condition is to blame.
episodes.title: In Vino Veritas

episodes.synopsis: When a food-truck vendor begins to behave oddly as a result of his success, Hank suspects there's a medical reason for the change.
episodes.title: Comfort's Overrated

episodes.synopsis: Hank finds himself treating his junior high nemesis, which forces him to separate his personal agenda from his professional responsibility.
episodes.title: The Hankover

episodes.synopsis: Hank treats Dr. Blair's 7-year-old son, Jake, whose symptoms appear to be related to his parents' divorce.
episodes.title: Frenemies

episodes.synopsis: When two lottery winners arrive in the Hamptons, Hank treats them for conditions that appear to be related to their lavish new lifestyles.
episodes.title: Whole Lotto Love

episodes.synopsis: Hank and Emily disagree about the course of treatment for a patient. Meanwhile, Evan seeks retaliation against Emily in cyberspace.
episodes.title: Big Whoop

episodes.synopsis: A chatty socialite needs medical treatment, but she disappears before Hank can diagnose her.
episodes.title: Open Up Your Yenta Mouth and Say Ah

episodes.synopsis: After Eddie has a heart attack, Hank and Evan learn the truth about their father's complicated past. Meanwhile, Divya remains disconcerted about Adam.
episodes.title: Mulligan

episodes.synopsis: When the entire cast of a reality TV show becomes ill, Hank and Divya must find the source of what's ailing everyone.
episodes.title: Pit Stop

episodes.synopsis: Hank examines a teenage music prodigy with overprotective parents. Meanwhile, Evan overhears a conversation between the general and his cronies.
episodes.title: A History of Violins

episodes.synopsis: When a big storm hits, Hank saves the life of a park ranger who wants to reproduce the side effects he experienced after being struck by lightning.
episodes.title: Astraphobia

episodes.synopsis: After moving to the Hamptons for its laidback vibe, Hank's latest client has trouble relaxing -- until he discovers a medical condition is to blame.
episodes.title: Fight or Flight

episodes.synopsis: Hank believes that a patient has been previously misdiagnosed and is determined to discover the real problem.
episodes.title: Listen to the Music

episodes.synopsis: HankMed saves the passengers of a toppled Jitney. Hank later treats an accident victim whose diagnosis might be more severe than her extreme anxiety.
episodes.title: Traffic

episodes.synopsis: A charity football tournament gets fierce as the party's host gets injured and Hank must put his competitive nature aside to treat him.
episodes.title: But There's a Catch

episodes.synopsis: A pair of best friends seek out HankMed when they worry their new line of house-cleaning products is making one of them sick.
episodes.title: Rash Talk

episodes.synopsis: On a trip to Florida to attend Eddie's parole hearing, Hank and Evan find him in the company of an erratic ex-con seeking spiritual salvation.
episodes.title: The Shaw/Hank Redemption

episodes.synopsis: Evan attempts to curry favor with his newfound grandfather at the horse races, but his luck runs out when he and Hank learn why they've never met Ted.
episodes.title: A Man Called Grandpa

episodes.synopsis: Libby's mothers call on Hank after an accident leaves one with a wound that refuses to heal. Evan, meanwhile, proposes to Paige.
episodes.title: An Apple a Day

episodes.synopsis: A magician calls on Hank to find the cause of his anxiety problems before another trick can go wrong. Evan books a segment on the Today show.
episodes.title: Ta Da For

episodes.synopsis: Hank treats a champion marathon runner who has started experiencing difficulty in regulating her body temperature while training.
episodes.title: Run, Hank, Run

episodes.synopsis: Hank is called to help a fearful asthmatic boy, whose courageous nanny gets mysteriously ill as well. Meanwhile, Paige's secret is exposed.
episodes.title: Me First

episodes.synopsis: Art collector Eric Kassabian calls on Hank when he can't stay conscious long enough to enjoy a painting he's chased after his entire career.
episodes.title: A Little Art, A Little Science

episodes.synopsis: Eric's life hangs in the balance after a prescription error, and Hank blames Dr. Van Dyke. Meanwhile, Paige makes Evan an offer he can't refuse.
episodes.title: A Farewell to Barnes

episodes.synopsis: When a mysterious illness overcomes the members of an up-and-coming rock band, Hank and Divya have to work together to find the cause.
episodes.title: Some Pig

episodes.synopsis: When a back problem limits Hank's ability to treat patients, Evan hires Dr. Van Dyke as a temporary replacement.
episodes.title: My Back to the Future

episodes.synopsis: When one calamity after another befalls a stage production, Hank is on hand to administer treatment. But it's Evan who is called on to save the day.
episodes.title: Bottoms Up

episodes.synopsis: Evan offers to assist Divya with her financial burden. Jill's nephew calls on HankMed when his boss fails to take care of some troubling symptoms.
episodes.title: Hank and the Deep Blue Sea

episodes.synopsis: Hank struggles with the death of a friend. Meanwhile, Evan teams with Boris's cousin, Claudette, on an experimental product that may help a patient.
episodes.title: This One's for Jack

episodes.synopsis: Hank and Divya treat a professional competitive eater, as well as a local amateur, who also happens to be Jill's brother.
episodes.title: After the Fireworks

episodes.synopsis: When Jill's chess-obsessed nephew gets kicked out of camp for fighting, Hank realizes Luke may be suffering from more than just teenage hormones.
episodes.title: Imperfect Storm

episodes.synopsis: Hank and Evan heatedly compete for a new business opportunity. Meanwhile, Divya covertly attempts to reconcile the brothers' differences.
episodes.title: A Guesthouse Divided

episodes.synopsis: Eddie returns to the Hamptons to reunite his boys with his new philosophy of life. Also, Hank treats a young couple planning a unique fundraiser.
episodes.title: Dawn of the Med

episodes.synopsis: Hank and Divya treat a matchmaker who's intent on setting each of them up. While Evan tries to rein in HankMed 3.0, Paige plans a kick-off party.
episodes.title: You Give Love a Bad Name

episodes.synopsis: HankMed treats an absentminded country club manager, while Evan, with Paige's help, lands the business opportunity he's always dreamed of.
episodes.title: About Face

episodes.synopsis: Hank is whisked to a secret meeting by Boris to help care for a stubborn Russian oligarch, and befriends their female interpreter in the process.
episodes.title: Fools Russian

episodes.synopsis: Hank and Divya treat a large-animal veterinarian who's going through a bitter divorce, while Evan and Paige help a grieving friend.
episodes.title: Manimal

episodes.synopsis: While HankMed treats an undercover DEA agent, Divya and Jeremiah tend to an MMA fighter. Hank becomes more involved with Boris' interpreter.
episodes.title: Business and Pleasure

episodes.synopsis: HankMed treats a polo team owner who won't quit playing despite his condition. Also, Evan frets about an impending meeting of the in-laws.
episodes.title: Who's Your Daddy?

episodes.synopsis: When a famous pop star comes to the Hamptons to prepare for her new world tour, HankMed must stay on hand to treat her for more than just exhaustion.
episodes.title: Dancing with the Devil

episodes.synopsis: While HankMed treats a high-strung student, her easygoing mother falls ill too, and Hank must race to diagnose the seemingly unconnected conditions.
episodes.title: Hurts Like a Mother

episodes.synopsis: Hank must travel across the globe to help an injured Dmitry. Meanwhile, Evan and Paige meet a woman who claims to be Paige's biological mother.
episodes.title: Something Fishy That Way Comes

episodes.synopsis: Hank cancels his weekend plans after treating an amateur beach volleyball player. Divya confronts her new boyfriend after a startling discovery.
episodes.title: Sand Legs

episodes.synopsis: It's the holidays in the Hamptons! But a blizzard may derail Evan and Paige's wedding. A face from Hank's past triggers memories for Hank and Evan.
episodes.title: Off-Season Greetings Part I

episodes.synopsis: Hank must confront his own medical condition while treating the girlfriend of a HankMed regular. Also, Hank and Evan's cousin arrives with a secret.
episodes.title: Off-Season Greetings Part II

episodes.synopsis: After recovering from neurosurgery, Hank treats a new Hamptonite whose fundraiser may be jeopardizing her health. Also, Evan pursues a new client.
episodes.title: Hankwatch

episodes.synopsis: Hank treats a local cop with a rebellious daughter whose antics may be affecting his health. Divya deals with complicated changes in her life.
episodes.title: Blythe Spirits

episodes.synopsis: With HankMed on hiatus, Divya and Jeremiah head to Georgia and meet a baseball player whose troubling medical condition could threaten his career.
episodes.title: Lawson Translation

episodes.synopsis: Hank and Divya treat the owner of a doggy day care, who may be suffering from an unexpected occupational hazard. Divya has big news for Hank and Evan.
episodes.title: Pregnant Paws

episodes.synopsis: Hank becomes increasingly involved in the lives of Officer Don and his daughter as he works to diagnose Don's ongoing health issues.
episodes.title: Vertigo

episodes.synopsis: When Divya's young neighbor falls ill, Jeremiah makes a diagnosis that hits Divya very close to home. Meanwhile, Hank makes a huge business decision.
episodes.title: Can of Worms

episodes.synopsis: Hank treats a spin instructor who has brought his intensity from Wall Street to the Hamptons. Paige makes a major purchase that upsets Evan.
episodes.title: Chock Full o' Nuts

episodes.synopsis: An unexpected visitor and a major auction at Shadow Pond thrust Hank, Evan and Paige into an unfamiliar world that requires them to pull together.
episodes.title: Hammertime

episodes.synopsis: Hank treats a florist whose dreams may reveal the answer to his medical problems. Meanwhile, Divya helps Evan prep for a debate.
episodes.title: Pins and Needles

episodes.synopsis: When Molly disappears, it's up to Hank and Don to bring her home safely, but the rescue effort turns dangerous. Divya travels to Italy to see her mom.
episodes.title: Game of Phones

episodes.synopsis: With Don in a coma, Hank advocates an aggressive treatment plan that puts him at odds with the head of the Hamptons Heritage ICU.
episodes.title: Open Invitation

episodes.synopsis: It's Election Day, and HankMed treats a thrill-seeking Hamptons reporter who isn't about to let her health interrupt her innovative election coverage.
episodes.title: A Trismus Story

episodes.synopsis: Hank treats a paleontologist who is preparing a fossilized dinosaur skeleton for auction. Russell has an injury that seems scientifically impossible.
episodes.title: Bones to Pick

episodes.synopsis: When Hank visits to attend a celebration for Divya and her daughter, Evan hatches a plan to make him stay; a saxophone player needs HankMed's help.
episodes.title: Smoke and Mirrors

episodes.synopsis: Hank worries that a rising tennis star's health may ruin her career; Hank and Evan adjust to a startling revelation about Eddie's past.
episodes.title: All in the Family

episodes.synopsis: Hank, Evan and Paige try to help Eddie forge a relationship with Emma; an amazing nanny helps alleviate Divya's anxiety about returning to work.
episodes.title: A Bridge Quite Not Far Enough

episodes.synopsis: Hank travels to Monte Carlo and finds himself in the middle of a plot to rid Boris's bank of a shadowy depositor.
episodes.title: Steaks on a Plane

episodes.synopsis: After reading about her struggle online, Evan reaches out to a woman with a mysterious illness in the hope that Hank can finally give her a diagnosis.
episodes.title: Goodwill Stunting

episodes.synopsis: The chef at Ray's restaurant seems to be getting drunk on the job, but Hank believes it is not just a matter of hitting the bottle.
episodes.title: Everybody Loves Ray, Man

episodes.synopsis: Hank and Divya treat a professional Hamptons house-sitter who never wants to grow up; Emma becomes a secret source of gossip for a trashy website.
episodes.title: Electric Youth

episodes.synopsis: Divya bonds with a patient who is struggling to get pregnant; an ex-girlfriend looks to Hank for medical advice; Jeremiah takes Viviana on a date.
episodes.title: I Did Not See That Coming

episodes.synopsis: Hank treats a perfumer who fears his livelihood is in jeopardy when he starts losing his sense of smell; Divya interferes with Jeremiah's love life.
episodes.title: Oh, M.G.

episodes.synopsis: Hank and Boris go to Argentina to meet a candidate for a clinical trial; Divya faces unexpected trials when she meets Sashi's Argentinean grandmother.
episodes.title: Good Air/Bad Air

episodes.synopsis: Divya and Jeremiah work together to treat Sloane, a model with an eating disorder; Evan tries to loosen ties between mobster Ray and HankMed.
episodes.title: HankMed on the Half Shell

episodes.synopsis: Hank treats Cinco when his sore wrist evidences more than a sprain; Evan and Paige help Emma confront Oz; Charlotte adjusts to life after surgery.
episodes.title: A Bigger Boat

episodes.synopsis: Hank and Evan search for Emma after her unexpected disappearance; Paige makes a shocking discovery; Divya faces a battle to keep her child.
episodes.title: Ganging Up
